assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Lanadelumab_Submission_InitiationCriteria_Q4
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Has the patient experienced at least three HAE attacks within any four-week period before initiating lanadelumab/berotralstat therapy that required the use of an acute injectable treatment? For those currently without long-term prophylactic therapy, use the current attack rate. For those currently using another form of long-term prophylactic therapy, use the historical attack rate, in other words, a past four-week period without long-term prophylaxis.
